DOC.brief_summary: To compare health economic parameter clinical outcome Phacoemulsification small incision cataract surgery ( SICS )
DOC.brief_title: Phaco Versus Small Incision Cataract Surgery ( SICS ) Health Economic Study
DOC.criteria: Patient senile cataract require unilateral cataract extraction follow implantation AcrySof PMMA ( polymethylmethacrylate ) posterior chamber intraocular lens ( IOL ) ; Pupil dilation ≧7 mm mydrisis ; Patient undergo cataract surgery first eye ; VA prognosis ≧6/12 Patients history ocular pathology diabetic retinopathy ; Patients traumatic , subluxate posterior polar cataract ; Patients ocular surgery past 6 month ; Patients significant intraoperative complication
